subject: Baseball
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: David Robertson received a qualifying offer from the Yankees — a one-year pact that would pay him handsomely. If he signs elsewhere, his new team will be required to forfeit a draft pick.
snippet: David Robertson received a qualifying offer from the Yankees — a one-year pact that would pay him handsomely. If he signs elsewhere, his new team will be required to forfeit a draft pick.
